**Did you get RAISA approval first?**
[[/div]]

[[div style="background-color: #fff0f0; border: solid 1px #600; border-radius: 20px; color: #300; max-width: 450px; margin: 20px auto 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.5); padding: 0 10px;"]]
The SCiPNET database has many resources to help you write your assigned SCP draft before you submit it for approval:
----

**[# Research Use Policy]**

[[div style="background-color: #fffff0; border: solid 1px #660; border-radius: 20px; color: #330; max-width: 450px; margin: 20px auto 0; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.5); padding: 0 10px;"]]
[[size 120%]]Remember: **The SCiPNET database is for the submission of final work, not for feedback and research help on unfinished work.**[[/size]]
----
It is your responsibility to post only verified, final work. You can and will be disciplined for improper or unfinished submissions. __Remember: unprofessional or incomplete research can cost lives__.

If you understand all of the above and still wish to create this page, click **[# here]** to do so.
[[/div]]

author: Ralliston
